title: Main Support LF ADC Duo Gold-Plat+
body:
Hey, I'm looking for an ADC Gold-Plat+ I can regularly duo with. Must have Skype/Discord/TS3 (can provide all) and a Working Microphone. Looking for non-toxic players (players who flame will immediately be deleted) who are serious and dedicated to the game but however can still cultivate a fun, banter-filled atmosphere for us to climb together while still being a friendly duo :) We all make mistakes (we are gold scrubs) and the expectation is that we both can learn from, accept and even make fun of each other's mistakes.

Any players interested can add me directly IGN: Support Leona, no point putting your name in the comments as I'll probably just add you anyways and it'll save us time :)
